summary:
I feel that Brelyna's voice never fit just right with her face, so me and a lil ghost made some adjustments to her.
<br />Now she is as snuggly as she sounds! ^_^
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer for Brelyna Maryon, her voice is so cute...
It takes one of the followers from winterhold and changes there look and skills. Is compatible with followers over haul and body sliders and more!

I always enjoy the vanilla followers over custom made followers. I don't know if its just my old memories of console glory or im just nostalgic, but either way I felt that the original female warriors of skyrim deserved to shine like custom npc's

Install
A very simple replacer file. it should work with any mod because it changes the original follower which can then be changed by any mods installed.

NOTE: if you want them to look like they do in the pictures you need Better Females by Bella if you don't already, it adds some sultry makeup...

Required Mods:
Apachii sky hair
The Eyes of Beauty

the photos are using Caliente w/ bodyslider for the body, but that is just my personal preference it will work with any body type, to make the follower you always wanted.
just extract the files to the skyrim data folder and that's it. super easy, super worth it.

Enjoy and be sure to check out my other follower replacers...
Alice
Ping Berlyan
Nija Lidia
author: Mann E Faces
